column3: Demonstration is mandatory & the bidders must demonstrate the quotedunit onsite in SMIMER Hospital.
The unit must be CE / ISO Certified product. Medical equipment safetycertificates for the unit should be provided.
Ergonomic or user friendly autoclavable handles Qty-2 must be providedwith per unit.

The portable OT light must have sturdy, rust proof & well balanced standdesigned to support the dome light. The spring articulated arm movementmust be smooth, adjustable & stable for proper use. The unit must havesturdy base as well as sturdy caster wheels for easy movement within theOT.
The portable OT Light must be supplied with 5 metres power cable.
